dc:title: Works of Mercy Oppose Violence in Labor's War
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Involves the C.W. in strikes in order to spread Catholic social teaching and promote better living conditions. Combats the charge that the C.W. is communist and encourages spiritual weapons to fight communism.
